short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows users to view custom css on GitHub profiles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fetches a custom css file from one of the following:

github.com/someuser/someuser/user.css
github.com/someuser/somerepo/repo.css
github.com/someorg/.github/repo.css

and displays the custom styles directly on the user profile, repository or organization profile.
